alert.note: Alert for Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso, Western Hudspeth Counties; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County; Southern Hudspeth Highlands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 5:35PM CST until January 11 at 10:00PM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. For the Blowing Dust Advisory, visibility between one quarter mile and one mile in blowing dust. * WHERE...Southern Hudspeth Highlands, Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso/Western Hudspeth Counties and Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 9 PM MST this evening. For the Blowing Dust Advisory, until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to reduced visibility. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Local areas may temporarily see visibilities reduced below one quarter mile between 1 pm and 6 pm. .
info.instruction: Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. Remember, Pull Aside, Stay Alive. Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso, Western Hudspeth Counties; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County; Southern Hudspeth Highlands
